name: MEC Comfort Saddle - Men's
description: This soft, wide saddle will keep you exploring all day long. The Comfort Saddle's base features softer inserts at the sit bones to spread pressure evenly, and the cut-out in the center keeps pressure off soft tissues.Double-density base spreads pressure over a larger surface for improved comfort.Centre cut-out channel takes pressure off soft tissues.High-density foam is supportive.Chromoly rails are light, yet very durable.
